name: Nineties Cockpit Freakout
description: Originally made for the first Idle Thumbs Wizard Jam in 2015, I never really finished the game at the time, because I didn't really know what I was doing (As you can see if you download the jam build). I then submitted the game to EGX Rezzed's Leftfield Collection, so I went back and finished it off, and made it look a LOT nicer. You can download the show build below, too.
